思前想後.definition: to consider past cause and future effect (idiom); to think over the past and future; to ponder over reasons and connection

思南.definition: Sinan, a county in Tongren 銅仁市|铜仁市[Tong2ren2 Shi4], Guizhou

思南縣.definition: Sinan, a county in Tongren 銅仁市|铜仁市[Tong2ren2 Shi4], Guizhou

思嘉麗.definition: Scarlett (name); also written 斯嘉麗|斯嘉丽[Si1 jia1 li4]

思密達.definition: (slang) (used at the end of a sentence to mimic Korean speech) (loanword from Korean verb ending "seumnida"); (jocular) a Korean

思忖.definition: to ponder; to reckon; to turn sth over in one's mind

思念.definition: to think of; to long for; to miss

思惟.definition: variant of 思維|思维[si1 wei2]

思想.definition: thought; thinking; idea; ideology; CL:個|个[ge4]

思慕.definition: to cherish the memory of sb; to think of with respect

思慮.definition: to think sth through; to consider carefully

思政.definition: ideological and political education (abbr. for 思想政治教育[si1xiang3-zheng4zhi4 jiao4yu4]) (state-directed education in China aimed at promoting Marxism, patriotism and socialist values, particularly in schools and universities – also, more broadly, ideological guidance in workplaces, media and public discourse)

思明.definition: Siming, a district of Xiamen 廈門市|厦门市[Xia4men2 Shi4], Fujian

思明區.definition: Siming, a district of Xiamen 廈門市|厦门市[Xia4men2 Shi4], Fujian

思春.definition: same as 懷春|怀春[huai2 chun1]

思春期.definition: age when girls start to develop feelings for the opposite sex; puberty

思潮.definition: tide of thought; way of thinking characteristic of a historical period; Zeitgeist

思潮起伏.definition: thoughts surging in one's mind (idiom); different thoughts coming to mind

思緒.definition: train of thought; emotional state; mood; feeling

思考.definition: to reflect on; to ponder over

思茅.definition: Simao city in Yunnan, renamed Pu'er city 普洱市 in 2007

思茅區.definition: Simao district of Pu'er city 普洱市[Pu3 er3 shi4], Yunnan

思茅市.definition: Simao city in Yunnan, renamed Pu'er city 普洱市 in 2007

思親.definition: to remember one's parents; to feel homesick for one's relatives

思謀.definition: to consider; to turn over in one's mind

思路.definition: line of thought; way of thinking

思辨.definition: to think critically; (philosophy) to reason; to speculate

思過.definition: to reflect on one's past errors

思量.definition: to reckon; to consider; to turn over in one's mind
